name: GUNRAT
description:
My submission to the Fall-O-Ween 2022 Jam "something else ... and cheese"

You are a rat, with a gun. In a randomly generated cheese, shoot the mould within the time limit. It's not a very fun game, you probably shouldn't try it.

~ not as high quality as my other projects because I was working on Cardolon [1666] for the MashUp Game Jam 2022 for the majority of this jam ~

CONTROLS:
  • WASD / D-Pad / Left-Joystick - Movement in the menu/game
  • SPACE / A Button - Shoot the gun in game / selection in the menu
  • RETURN - Restart the game / selection in the menu
  • ESCAPE - Exit the game
KNOWN BUGS:
  • It is possible for the spawn location to not be within a moveable tile
    • This makes the game unplayable, and must be restarted by pressing the "RETURN" key on a keyboard.
  • The bullet's collision detection with the mould doesn't line up with the on-screen position
    • Keep shooting until the bullets collide properly.
  • Both the rat and the bullet can walk through walls at a diagonal to each other
    • This is an Intended Game Mechanic^TM, as the walls were originally going to have curved edges.
  • The bullet doesn't line up with the gun when firing
  • The game isn't fun
    • This unfixable
    • Go play any of my other games instead, such as Cardalon [1666] or Imperial Flight Deluxe
ASSETS USED:
  • Kenney Font Package - Kenney
  • Rat, Cat and Dog - Reemax
  • Gun and Bullet - donnie9171
